text: Hey Sabrina, it really depends on what type of software youâ€™re looking into.
What and how are you looking to integrate?

We are looking for the best platform (and not super expensive) to handle a Live Auction and allow that informatoin to directly flow into HubSpot. I know there are event platforms that integrate - just trying to get a good recommendation.

An event platform that easily integrates (and is built for HubSpot) is <http://SimpleEvents.io|SimpleEvents.io>

For the auction site, <@U03REFNRMB3> I know you once built this from scratch, have you seen anything that integrate with HubSpot?

<@U074F8QLF3Q> oooh bring back some memories!! Live Auctions!

What information are you wanting to flow into HubSpot. The more specific the better Carter and/or myself could guide you!

<http://SimpleEvents.io|SimpleEvents.io> is a great tool (PS, I created it) for handling registration and attendance for a live auctions.

Are they in-person or virtual auctions?

<@U03REFNRMB3> <@U01QVR44MEY> I appreciate you both hopping on this... unfortunately building from scratch isn't an option with the time (always last minute and immediate need! LOL) . There are two aspects - An in-person auction for items, and then a fund-in-need paddle raise. So we were thinking looking to do a registrant page w/in HubSpot... so I'll need to have those registrants that "won" the auction, and did a paddle raise flow over from whatever platform we choose (and connect with the registrants). We would also want to have a payment option available.

Now that I'm typing this up - I'm thinking we may need to do the registrant page in the event platform (to allow for the payment for ticket purchase) and house the CC info for the auctions...
